string.name: interestingStuff
string.br: The word \"queue\" is the only word in the English language that is still pronounced the same way when the last four letters are removed.\n\n
Coca-Cola would be green if colouring weren\'t added to it.\n\n
More people are killed each year from bees than from snakes.\n\n

string.name: interestingStuff2
string.br: Months that begin on a Sunday will always have a \"Friday the 13th.\"\n\n
In 1386, a pig in France was executed by public hanging for the murder of a child\n\n
Human thigh bones are stronger than concrete.\n\n

string.name: interestingStuff3
string.br: The six official languages of the United Nations are: English, French, Arabic, Chinese, Russian and Spanish.\n\n
Earth is the only planet not named after a god.\n\n
Some worms will eat themselves if they can\'t find any food!\n\n
